name: Save the Bees! (Noctu, SlimToast, XDether, Yoshimi.Sa.Ma, Fulmen)
name_original: Save the Bees! (Noctu, SlimToast, XDether, Yoshimi.Sa.Ma, Fulmen)
description:
Welcome to the beehive, little bee!

We really need a doctor in here! 

Oh, and someone who could serve us food! 

Oh and- uh, maybe you could fill multiple roles?

How to play

Move your bee by moving your mouse over the screen

Each visiting bee needs some kind of help: Go into the storage room to access your supplies and click on the bee in need to help them out.

But watch out! If you let them wait for too long, there might be dire consequences!

- This project was made in a weekend long game jam - 

Our team: 

XDether 🐝 Fulmen 🐝 Yoshimi.Sa.Ma 🐝 SlimToast 🐝 Noctu
